sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Look up termination reference records for company
Look up term, new hire, employee update, and input catalog item
Look up group records with encoded query

sys_variable_value.value: catalog item is current catalog item

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Loop through catalog items looked up
Add specific access request to encoded query

sys_variable_value.value: group encoded query is not blank
catalog item is not term, update, or new hire
